blocks.name: ixxval
blocks.content: Value of the interval function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cxr, cxr, crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  ovmpt2(s1, s2, c0, cxr, c1, cxr, c2, crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)))), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)))))
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(s1), c0, c3, cv(s0))
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(s2), c1), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c1), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  breq2(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0), c4)
  rabex(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  xrex()
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1)})
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ℝ*, s2 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(s1[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1)}), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1)}), d(s0, c4))
  ovmpt2(s1, s2, c0, cxr, c1, cxr, c2, { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1)}, { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(s1[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2)}, { s0 ∈ ℝ* |(c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2)})
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, s1 = c0, (s1[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2), (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2))
  anbi1d(s1 = c0, s1[c3]s0, s0[c4]s2, c0[c3]s0)
  breq1(s1, c0, c3, s0)
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, s2 = c1, (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]s2), (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1))
  anbi2d(s2 = c1, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]s2, s0[c4]c1)
  breq2(s2, c1, s0, c4)
  rabex(s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1))
  xrex()
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1))
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c3, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ∧ s0[c4]c1))
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c3, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elixx1
blocks.content: Membership in an interval of extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elixx1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)), wcel(c2, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c0, c3, c1), crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  ixxval(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  bitr4i(wcel(c2, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))))
  elrab(s2, c2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  breq2(cv(s2), c2, c0, c4)
  breq1(cv(s2), c2, c5, c1)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c2, c5, c1)
}

blocks.name: ixxf
blocks.content: The set of intervals of extended reals maps to subsets of extended reals. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s2, c2))
  mpbi(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), wral(s0, cxr, wral(s1, cxr, wcel(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr)))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, wcel(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr)))
  elpwi2(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cxr, universe)
  xrex()
  ssrab2(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr), c0)
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixxf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s1, c2))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s2, c1))
  a1ii((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), d(s2, c2))
  mpbi((c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ*, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ*, { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)} ∈ P(ℝ*))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)} ∈ P(ℝ*))
  elpwi2({ s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)}, cxr, universe)
  xrex()
  ssrab2(s2, cxr, (s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)}, P(ℝ*), c0)
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ixxex
blocks.content: The set of intervals of extended reals exists. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  ssexi(c0, cxp(cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)))
  xpex(cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  xpex(cxr, cxr)
  pwex(cxr)
  xrex()
  ax-mp(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))), wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)))
  ixxf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  fssxp(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixxex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c2]s1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  ssexi(c0, ((ℝ* × ℝ*)× P(ℝ*)))
  xpex((ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ*))
  xpex(cxr, cxr)
  pwex(cxr)
  xrex()
  ax-mp(c0 ⊆((ℝ* × ℝ*)× P(ℝ*)), (c0 :(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ*)))
  ixxf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  fssxp(c0, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ*))
}

blocks.name: ixxssxr
blocks.content: The set of intervals of extended reals maps to subsets of extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxssxr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxr)
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxr), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxr), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxr), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxr), diffsc(s1, c2))

  3jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c5, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c2))

  simpl(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))

thm ixxssixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1]c2)⊆(c0[c3]c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c5]s1)})
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c6]s2 ∧ s2[c7]s1)})

  ⊣ ((s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*)→(s3[c5]c2 → s3[c7]c2))

  ⊣ d(s3, c0)

  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)

  ssriv(s3, (c0[c1]c2), (c0[c3]c2))
  mpcom(s3 ∈(c0[c1]c2), s3 ∈(c0[c3]c2), (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*))
  elmpt2cl(s0, s1, s3, c0, c1, c2, cxr, cxr, { s2 ∈ ℝ* |(s0[c4]s2 ∧ s2[c5]s1)})
  3imtr4d((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*), s3 ∈(c0[c1]c2), s3 ∈(c0[c3]c2), (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3 ∧ s3[c5]c2), (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c6]s3 ∧ s3[c7]c2))
  3jcad((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*), (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3 ∧ s3[c5]c2), s3 ∈ ℝ*, c0[c6]s3, s3[c7]c2)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*), ((s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3 ∧ s3[c5]c2)→ s3 ∈ ℝ*))
  simp1(s3 ∈ ℝ*, c0[c4]s3, s3[c5]c2)
  syl2im((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*), (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3 ∧ s3[c5]c2), c0[c6]s3, c0 ∈ ℝ*, (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  3simpa(s3 ∈ ℝ*, c0[c4]s3, s3[c5]c2)
  expimpd(c0 ∈ ℝ*, s3 ∈ ℝ*, c0[c4]s3, c0[c6]s3)
  syl2im((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ*), (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0[c4]s3 ∧ s3[c5]c2), s3[c7]c2, c2 ∈ ℝ*, (s3 ∈ ℝ* ∧ s3[c5]c2))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  3simpb(s3 ∈ ℝ*, c0[c4]s3, s3[c5]c2)

  elixx1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2, s3, c1, c4, c5)

thm ixxdisj(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

  ssrdv(s3, cin(co(c0, c3, c1), co(c1, c4, c2)), emptycls, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  syl5bi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(co(c0, c3, c1), co(c1, c4, c2))), wcel(cv(s3), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c3, c1)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c1, c4, c2))))
  elin(cv(s3), co(c0, c3, c1), co(c1, c4, c2))

  simp2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c5, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c0))), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  simp1d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)))

  elixx3g(s0, s1, s2, cv(s3), c3, c4, c1, c6, c8)

blocks.name: ixxub
blocks.content: Extract the upper bound of an interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wceq(csup(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  xrletrid(csup(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wbr(csup(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), cle, c1), wral(s3, co(c0, c2, c1), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1)))
  ralrimiva(s3, co(c0, c2, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1))
  mpd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c2, c1))), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1), wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1))
  simp3d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c2, c1))), wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c2, c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c2, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wb(wbr(csup(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), cle, c1), wral(s3, co(c0, c2, c1), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1))), wss(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  supxrleub(s3, co(c0, c2, c1), c1)
  xrnltled(c1, csup(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)))

blocks.name: ixxlb
blocks.content: Extract the lower bound of an interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxlb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wceq(cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c4, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), clt, c1), wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1), wbr(cv(s3), cle, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  xrletrid(cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)))

  nrexdv(s3, cq, w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt))))
  pm2.65da(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt))), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))
  mpbid(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))), wn(wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt))), wbr(cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), cle, cv(s3)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))), wbr(cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), cle, cv(s3)), wss(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c2, c1)))

  mpd(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)))

  ad2antrr(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  mpd(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))), wbr(cv(s3), c4, c1), wbr(cv(s3), clt, c1))
  xrltletrd(cv(s3), c1, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt), wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(co(c0, c2, c1), emptycls)), wcel(cv(s3), cq)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), clt, cinf(co(c0, c2, c1), cxr, clt)))))

blocks.name: iooex

  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, s0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  ixxval(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cioo, clt, clt)

blocks.name: ioon0
blocks.content: An open interval of extended reals is nonempty iff the lower argument is less than the upper argument. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: ndmioo
blocks.content: The open interval function's value is empty outside of its domain. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndmioo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  ndmov(c0, cxr, c1, cioo)
  fdmi(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  ixxf(hs0, hs1, hs2, cioo, clt, clt)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
}

thm ndmioo(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬(c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)→(c0[(,)]c1)= ∅)
} = {
  ndmov(c0, cxr, c1, cioo)
  fdmi(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ*))
  ixxf(hs0, hs1, hs2, cioo, clt, clt)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(clt)
}

blocks.name: iooid

blocks.name: elioore

thm elicore(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

thm elicore(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2))→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
} = {
  syl22anc((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2)), c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1, c1[<]+∞)
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c0[≤]c1)
  simpld(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c0[≤]c1, c1[<]c2)
  xrltletrd(c1, cpnf, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2)))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  simp3d(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2)), +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  pnfxr()
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c1[<]c2)
  simprd(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c1[<]c2, c0[≤]c1)
  simprd(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), (c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[<]c2), (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c2[≤]+∞)
  syl(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c2[≤]+∞, c2 ∈ ℝ*)
  simp2d(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), c2 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  simpld(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), (c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*), (c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[<]c2))
  biimpi(c1 ∈(c0[[,)]c2), ((c0 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ*)∧(c0[≤]c1 ∧ c1[<]c2)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c0, cico, c2, cle, clt)

blocks.name: ubioc1

blocks.name: lbico1

blocks.name: iccleub

blocks.name: iccgelb

blocks.name: elioo5

blocks.name: eliooxr

blocks.name: eliooord

  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))

  sylibr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(c0, cr)))
  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(c0, cr))
  eliooxr(c0, c1, c2)

  eliooord(c0, c1, c2)
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
  anim1i(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)))

thm elioc2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
} = {

thm iccss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wss(co(c2, cicc, c3), co(c0, cicc, c1)))

  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wss(co(c2, cicc, c3), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  rexr(c1)
  ixxss12(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, cle, c2, c3, cle, cicc, cicc, cle, cle, cle, cle)
  df-icc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrletr(c0, c2, cv(hs3))
  xrletr(cv(hs3), c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs3.c(c0)

blocks.name: iccss2
blocks.content: Condition for a closed interval to be a subset of another closed interval. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

thm iccss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cicc, c2)))
} = {
  syl22anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c3, cle, c2))
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2))), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cicc, c2, cle, cle)
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wbr(c3, cle, c2))
  simprd(wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wbr(c3, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  simprbi(wcel(c3, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, c1, cicc, c2, cle, cle)
  ixxss12(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c1, c2, cle, c0, c3, cle, cicc, cicc, cle, cle, cle, cle)
  df-icc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrletr(c1, c0, cv(hs3))
  xrletr(cv(hs3), c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(cle)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(cicc)

thm iccss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)∧ c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2))→(c0[[,]]c3)⊆(c1[[,]]c2))
} = {
  syl22anc((c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)∧ c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)), (c0[[,]]c3)⊆(c1[[,]]c2), c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c1[≤]c0, c3[≤]c2)
  simp1d((c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)∧ c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)), c1 ∈ ℝ*, c2 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  simp2d((c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)∧ c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)), c2 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ ℝ*)
  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ∈ ℝ*))
  simplbi(c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ∈ ℝ*), (c1[≤]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2))
  simpld((c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)∧ c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2)), c1[≤]c0, c0[≤]c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1[≤]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2))
  simprbi(c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1[≤]c0 ∧ c0[≤]c2), (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c0 ∈ ℝ*))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cicc, c2, cle, cle)
  adantl(c0 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), c3[≤]c2)
  simprd(c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), c3[≤]c2, c1[≤]c3)
  simprbi(c3 ∈(c1[[,]]c2), (c1[≤]c3 ∧ c3[≤]c2), (c1 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ* ∧ c3 ∈ ℝ*))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, c1, cicc, c2, cle, cle)
  ixxss12(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c1, c2, cle, c0, c3, cle, cicc, cicc, cle, cle, cle, cle)
  df-icc(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrletr(c1, c0, hs3)
  xrletr(hs3, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)

blocks.name: iccssioo2
blocks.content: Condition for a closed interval to be a subset of an open interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccssioo2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
} = {
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c3, clt, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wne(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wne(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls))
  ne0i(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2))
  necon1ai(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls, wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  ndmioo(c1, c2)
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  eliooord(c0, c1, c2)
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wbr(c3, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c2)))
  eliooord(c3, c1, c2)
  iccssioo(c1, c2, c0, c3)
}

thm iccssico2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cico, c2)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  elmpt2cl1(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cico, c2, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), clt, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c2, cxr))
  elmpt2cl2(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cico, c2, cxr, cxr, crab(hs2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), clt, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  simpld(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cico, c2, cle, clt)
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cico, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wbr(c3, clt, c2))
  simprd(wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wbr(c3, clt, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  simprbi(wcel(c3, co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)))
  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, c1, cico, c2, cle, clt)

  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, c1, cico, c2, cle, clt)

blocks.name: ioomax
blocks.content: The open interval from minus to plus infinity. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioomax() {
  |- wceq(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), cr)
} = {
  eqtr4i(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), cr, crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  iooval2(hs0, cmnf, cpnf)
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, wceq(cr, crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  rabid2(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf))
  mnflt(cv(hs0))
  ltpnf(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ioomax() {
  ⊢ (-∞[(,)]+∞)= ℝ
} = {
  eqtr4i((-∞[(,)]+∞), cr, { hs0 ∈ ℝ |(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]+∞)})
  mp2an((-∞[(,)]+∞)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ |(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]+∞)}, -∞ ∈ ℝ*, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  iooval2(hs0, cmnf, cpnf)
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, ℝ = { hs0 ∈ ℝ |(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]+∞)}, (-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]+∞))
  rabid2(hs0, cr, (-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[<]+∞))
  jca(hs0 ∈ ℝ, -∞[<]hs0, hs0[<]+∞)
  mnflt(hs0)
  ltpnf(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: iooshf
blocks.content: Shift the arguments of the open interval function. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm iooshf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c3, caddc, c1)))))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c3, caddc, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3)))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
  3com13(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1))))
  ltaddsub(c2, c1, c0)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3)))
  bicomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3))
  ltsubadd(c0, c1, c3)
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wcel(c0, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c3, caddc, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wb(wcel(c0, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c3, caddc, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c3, caddc, c1)))), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cxr), wcel(co(c3, caddc, c1), cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c1), cxr))
  rexrd(co(c2, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  readdcl(c2, c1)
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c3, caddc, c1), cxr))
  rexrd(co(c3, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  readdcl(c3, c1)
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  elioo5(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c3, caddc, c1), c0)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wa(wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmin, c1), clt, c3))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cxr))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexr(c2)
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c3, cxr))
  rexr(c3)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cxr))
  rexrd(co(c0, cmin, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  resubcl(c0, c1)
  elioo5(c2, c3, co(c0, cmin, c1))
}

blocks.name: iccsupr
blocks.content: A nonempty subset of a closed real interval satisfies the conditions for the existence of its supremum (see ~ suprcl ). (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Jan-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccsupr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2)), w3a(wss(c2, cr), wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3jca(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(c2, cr), wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c2, cr))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wss(c2, cr), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  ancoms(wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wss(c2, cr))
  sstr(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1), cr)
  3ad2ant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  ne0i(c3, c2)
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cr), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1))
  simp3d(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)))
  imp(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cv(s1), c2), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))
  sylan9r(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  ssel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s1))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))
  elicc2(c0, c1, cv(s1))
  brralrspcev(s1, s0, c1, cr, c2, cv(s1), cle)

blocks.name: ioof
blocks.content: The set of open intervals of extended reals maps to subsets of reals. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)

thm ioof() {
  |- wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
} = {
  mpbi(wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)), wral(hs0, cxr, wral(hs2, cxr, wcel(crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))), cpw(cr)))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs2, cxr, wcel(crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))), cpw(cr)))
  syl6eqelr(crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))), cpw(cr), co(cv(hs0), cioo, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs2), cxr)))
  iooval(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  mpbir(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cioo, cv(hs2)), cpw(cr)), wss(co(cv(hs0), cioo, cv(hs2)), cr))
  ioossre(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  elpw(co(cv(hs0), cioo, cv(hs2)), cr)
  ovex(cv(hs0), cioo, cv(hs2))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs2, cxr, cxr, crab(hs1, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), clt, cv(hs2)))), cpw(cr), cioo)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs2, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cr))
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(cr))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
}

} = {

blocks.name: dfioo2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the set of open intervals of extended reals. (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfioo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wceq(cioo, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  eqtri(cioo, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioo, cv(s1))))
  mpbi(wceq(cioo, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioo, cv(s1)))), wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  fnov(s0, s1, cioo, cxr, cxr)
  mpt2eq3ia(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, co(cv(s0), cioo, cv(s1)), crab(s2, cr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)))))
  iooval2(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfioo2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ⊢ (,)=(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ |(s0[<]s2 ∧ s2[<]s1)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  eqtri(cioo, (s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦ { s2 ∈ ℝ |(s0[<]s2 ∧ s2[<]s1)}), (s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦(s0[(,)]s1)))
  mpbi((,)=(s0 ∈ ℝ*, s1 ∈ ℝ* ↦(s0[(,)]s1)), (,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*))
  ax-mp((,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ))
  fnov(s0, s1, cioo, cxr, cxr)
  mpt2eq3ia(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, (s0[(,)]s1), { s2 ∈ ℝ |(s0[<]s2 ∧ s2[<]s1)})
  iooval2(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ioorebas
blocks.content: Open intervals are elements of the set of all open intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.)

} = {

  syl6eqel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo), emptycls, wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  id(wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls))
  eqeltrri(emptycls, crn(cioo), co(nat0, cioo, nat0))
  iooid(nat0)
  mp3an(wcel(co(nat0, cioo, nat0), crn(cioo)), wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  fnovrn(cioo, cxr, cxr, nat0, nat0)
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, cioo, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  eliooxr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo)), wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  fnovrn(cioo, cxr, cxr, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cioo, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), crn(cioo)))

blocks.name: xrge0neqmnf

blocks.name: xrge0nre
blocks.content: An extended real which is not a real is plus infinity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: elrege0

blocks.name: nn0rp0
blocks.content: A nonnegative integer is a nonnegative real number. (Contributed by AV, 24-May-2020.)

blocks.name: rge0ssre
blocks.content: Nonnegative real numbers are real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Sep-2019.)

blocks.name: elxrge0

  ltneg(c0, c2)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2))))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2))))
  ltneg(c2, c1)

  syl3an(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cioo, cneg(c0))), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr))

blocks.content: The union of two adjacent left-closed right-open real intervals is a left-closed right-open real interval. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 15-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.)

} = {

blocks.content: The union of an open interval with its upper endpoint is a left-open right-closed interval. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 8-Jun-2019.)

thm ioounsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c0, cioc, c1)))

  simp2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  ixxun(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, c1, clt, cle, cioo, cicc, cioc, clt, clt, cle, cle)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  -| wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), c5)
} = {

thm icccntri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wcel(c3, crp)
  -| wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c3), c5)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), wcel(c0, cr))
  sseli(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2), cr)

  iccssre(c1, c2)
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))), wcel(c3, crp))

  icccntr(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5)

blocks.name: iccf1o
blocks.content: Describe a bijection from ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` to an arbitrary nontrivial closed interval ` [ A , B ] ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
